price: Kandi mu by’ukuri ibiyiriho (isi) tuzabigira imbuga nsa.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
